QuestData.Title: The Crone
QuestData.Description: Do you remember our greeting, $p?$B$B"Shadows gather when the raven swallows the day."$B$BIt is more than an old verse - it is a call to action. Followers of the old ways are gathering, and I must join them. You are needed, too, I should think$B$BFollow this road down to Crow's Crook. There you will find the home of an old crone. Greet her as you greeted me, and she will guide the way.$B$BYou will not see me, but I will be close behind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak the password to Ornekka at Crow's Crook.
QuestData.CompletionText: You would be wise to turn back, traveler.
QuestData.RewardText: I will point you in the right direction, but I cannot guarantee you'll survive the trip.$B$BKah-hah haha!
